name: Permafrost (SoCalledWarrior, Brandmuffin, bobert0)
description:
Team 4's Submission for the ACM Studio Snowjam game jam. We wanted to make a 2D sprite based platform based around ice and "freezing" things.

Controls:

WASD to move

Space to jump

IJKL for dash

F for freeze

Credits:

Ashley Lu - UI/UX

Brandon Truong - UI/UX, Programming

Colette Shvager - Art

Lily Zhou - Programming

Stefan Abgarian - Programming, Level Design

Trevor Ong - Music
